title: Bug: [new config system] path to a directory lints files outside that directory

labels.name: accepted
labels.description: There is consensus among the team that this change meets the criteria for inclusion

labels.name: archived due to age
labels.description: This issue has been archived; please open a new issue for any further discussion

body:
### Environment

Node version: v16.14.0
npm version: v8.3.1
Local ESLint version: v8.23.0 (Currently used)
Global ESLint version: Not found
Operating System: win32 10.0.19044


### What parser are you using?

Default (Espree)

### What did you do?

Running ESLint in a local ESLint repo, `main` branch.

```
npx eslint tools -f tap
```

### What did you expect to happen?

Successful linting and a list of the 12 files under the `tools` directory.

### What actually happened?

Successful linting and a list of 359 files under the `tools` and `tests` directories.
